metadata.title: CVE-2012-5607 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
The "Lost Password" reset functionality in ownCloud before 4.0.9 and 4.5.0does not properly check the security token, which allows remote attackersto change an accounts password via unspecified vectors related to a "RemoteTiming Attack."

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-5607` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

owncloud - 5.0.4debian-0ubuntu1
owncloud-mysql - 5.0.4debian-0ubuntu1
owncloud-pgsql - 5.0.4debian-0ubuntu1
owncloud-sqlite - 5.0.4debian-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: owncloud package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.0.4debian-0ubuntu1').
